price: I velikaš reče: "Dovedite mi ga, uzet ću ga u svoju svitu", i pošto porazgovara s njim, reče mu: "Ti ćeš od danas kod nas utjecajan i od povjerenja biti."
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱئۡتُونِي بِهِۦٓ أَسۡتَخۡلِصۡهُ لِنَفۡسِيۖ فَلَمَّا كَلَّمَهُۥ قَالَ إِنَّكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَدَيۡنَا مَكِينٌ أَمِينٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqāla al-maliku i'tūnī bihi astakhliṣ'hu linafsī falammā kallamahu qāla innaka al-yawma ladaynā makīnun amīnun
